description:
The method assertEquals has been deprecated since python 2.7.
http://docs.python.org/2/library/unittest.html#deprecated-aliases

Also in Python 3, a deprecated warning is raised when using assertEquals
therefore we should use assertEqual instead.
title: assertEquals is deprecated

comments.content:
The method assertEquals has been deprecated since python 2.7.
http://docs.python.org/2/library/unittest.html#deprecated-aliases

Also in Python 3, a deprecated warning is raised when using assertEquals
therefore we should use assertEqual instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

comments.content: Just FYI, a blueprint https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/assertequal was also logged for this change.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513

comments.content:
According to the related blueprint this was all completed in Icehouse:

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/assertequal
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
